      Constructors in data.graph with parameters of type Vertex 
      Constructor and Description
      Edge(Vertex v1, Vertex v2)
      Constructs a new edge between two nodes and assigns a weight depending on if either vertex is a wall tile A high weight is assigned to an edge linking to a wall in order to make it possible to walk on the wall tiles in an emergency, such as if there is no proper path from start to goal.
